version_description: Bug fixes

New Redesigned Listings - We’re excited to introduce a new Browse page that better highlights new & interesting content. We want to showcase the best, most interesting places to shop.
Search history - Making it easier than ever to obsessively find the best deal on that new TV.

- You can now add a loyalty card by searching for the retailer's name
- Spelling correction suggestions have now been added to search to help you with those pesky typos

Save your favorite flyers and have them available on any device with Flipp. When you create a Flipp account, your favorite flyers automatically get saved and can be accessed from any device you're logged into.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
- Improved Search Functionality: You can now filter down your search results to find products at your favorite stores.
We’re currently testing out some new features before we make them official. Not everyone will see these changes so don’t be alarmed if everything looks the same as always.

- Poor internet connection? You can now preview a previously viewed storefront when you're offline.

Bug fixes.

• You can now favorite merchants straight from the Browse tab
• The <3 tab (favorites) at the top of your screen is now pinned for quicker access
• Swiping horizontally when viewing an ad will show you more relevant ads
• When we can't find results for your search, we'll show you some related items

• You can now favorite merchants straight from the Browse tab
• The <3 tab (favorites) at the top of your screen is now pinned for quicker access
• Swiping horizontally when viewing an ad will show you more relevant ads
• When we can't find results for your search, we'll show you some related items

- We will now suggest more great content at the bottom of your weekly ads.
- Bug fixes

- We now support iOS 12
- Siri can now suggest weekly ads for you to view
- Siri can now suggest popular searches

- We'll now suggest related retailers in Search

- It's now easier to find and clip items in a flyer after clicking on a search result
- You can now see trending searches on the search screen

Looking for even more savings? You can now find available coupons for your favourite retailers through a ‘coupons tab’ inside the weekly flyer.

Flipp just made it easier to see item details! Search for an item and tap the deal you like to show more product details, features, and even reviews.

Flipp is revamping its coupons experience to help you save more. Tap the coupons tab and choose a retailer to discover available coupons in your area.

Flipp has made it easier than ever to share great deals found on the app! Simply tap the item you want to share inside a weekly ad and tap ‘Share Item’ to send it to your friends and family.
Keep an eye out for more great ways to share weekly ads, coupons, and more coming soon.

Flipp has made it easier than ever to share coupon savings found on the app! Simply tap the coupon you want to share and tap the ‘Share coupon’ button to send it to your friends and family.
Keep an eye out for more great ways to share weekly ads and more coming soon.

Sharing deals just got a lot easier with our new weekly ad sharing feature. With just one tap, you can now share a weekly ad with family and friends so they never miss a sale again. Get the latest app update to start saving together.
Bug fixes
Flipp will now remember your customized search filters to help you find the deals you want, faster than ever.
We caught a few bugs that you’re better off without, so that you can keep finding the deals you love.
We caught a few bugs that you’re better off without, so that you can keep finding the deals you love.

Introducing Watch List! The easiest way to track the deals you want. Whatever the item, big or small, let Flipp find you the best deals. This feature will be available to all users over the coming weeks.
Introducing Watch List! Create a list of deals to easily monitor, and receive alerts when an item goes on sale. This feature will be available to all users over the coming weeks.

We fixed a bug that you’re better off without, so that you can keep finding the deals you love. What bug did we fix in this version?

- Our notification pop up was coming up for users more often than we’d like. We fixed that so you can search for savings & deals without being interrupted!

Introducing Dark Mode! Choose between “Light” (classic), “Dark”, or “System” for your preferred browsing experience. Choosing “System” will follow the settings you’ve set for your device. To change between modes go to Settings, then Appearance.

Branding update. We cleaned up the colors throughout the app for a modern, sleek look and improved accessibility. Updates include:
• App icon in new brand color
• Updated startup screen

Find the deal at the price you want! We are also introducing price filtering capabilities within Watch List. Now watch and get instant alerts when a price drops!
